title: Knock
content:
: Unlock an object that is held shut by a mundane lock. Level: Lvl 2 spell School: Transmutation School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: No

How to Acquire Knock

Knock can be acquired by the following classes: Bard College of Lore (Bard Subclass) College of Valour (Bard Subclass) Sorcerer Wizard Abjuration School (Wizard Subclass) Necromancy School (Wizard Subclass) Conjuration School (Wizard Subclass) Enchantment School (Wizard Subclass) Divination Schoo
